participant_1.background:
I have a rocking chair in my granddaughter's nursery.
I lift heavy weights and enjoy a meatless diet.
I am a house wife who loves my cat Cow.
i live with my husband and two children.
I'm a go-getter and always looking for ways to challenge myself.

participant_2.background:
My stamp collection was stolen when my house was broken into.
i ca swim very fast.
i work part time.
I wake up early, meditate, and then have a healthy breakfast before starting my day.
i love to go hiking.

content.text: Hello! What a wonderful day it is!
Good morning! I love days like this!
What do you like to do on days like this?
I enjoy going for hikes, swimming, or reading.
I love swimming, too! But I prefer to go in the morning when it is less crowded.
I never thought of that! I will try that next time.
What do you do for work?
I work part time at a coffee shop. It is a great job, but I am looking for something new.
Oh, I have always thought about working at a coffee shop.
It is fun, but it can be stressful.
I bet it can be! But it sounds like you are good at it.
I try my best! What do you do for work?
I am a stay-at-home mom. I love it, but it can be challenging.
I bet it can be! But I am sure your kids love you very much.
They do! They are my everything.
